twcore.core
Class HubBot

java.lang.Object
  twcore.core.SubspaceBot
      twcore.core.HubBot

public class HubBot
extends SubspaceBot

Bot designed to spawn other bots (both manually and automatically from autoload.cfg). It also sets access privileges based on the server's access lists. The hub bot is essential for the operation of all other bots in TWCore.

Constructor Detail

HubBot

public HubBot(BotAction botAction)
Creates the hub bot's thread grouping, registers commands, sets up accepted events, and starts the bot queue thread. Once HubBot has logged on (LoggedOn event received) it begins loading other bots.

Parameters:
botAction - Reference to BotAction object from Session
Method Detail

public void registerCommands()
Registers all commands needed for operation of the HubBot.

LoadAccessLists

public void LoadAccessLists()
Clears all current access lists, and sets up the new lists based on access CFG files and the three server-based access lists.
